Title: Bruce Aylward: Humanity vs. Ebola. How we could win a terrifying war
Comment: To beat ebola each community must understand how it spreads. Particularly important as holding a child or participating in a traditional funeral may spread the decease; both deep rooted practices of caring for our beloved ones.

Title: Bassam Tariq: The beauty and diversity of Muslim life
Comment: Empathy is powerful against prejudice, as also recognized by the 'fifty shades of gay' TED-talk.

Title: Julia Sweeney: Letting go of God
Comment: Do you feel God's love? vs Do you believe in God's love?

Title: Dan Dennett: Let's teach religion -- all religion -- in schools
Severine Autesserre: To solve mass violence, look to locals
Comment: Grass root peace movements have a large impact and can help mitigate problems that are out of reach from international policies. One such example is given in another TED-talk; 'if Christmas can come to you [guerilla in the jungle], you can come home to it'
